drupalNodeEvent.title: 2021 Southeast Regional Conference of the Association for Aisan Studies

field_organizers.processed: Carolina Asia Center, SEC-AAS, University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill

field_description.processed:
We're proud to host the upcoming 2021 Southeast Regional Conference of the Association for Asian Studies on January 15-17, 2021!
Registration is now live at go.unc.edu/2021secaas. Click the link to view our conference webpage with full schedule, abstracts, and bios.
There is no registration fee for this yearâ€™s conference; we are delighted that the conference will be free for all participants. The Carolina Asia Center is grateful for the support of the Southeast Conference of the Association for Asian Studies, the Council of Conferences of the Association for Asian Studies, and the UNC Office of the Vice-Provost for Global Affairs for making this virtual conference possible
